description.p: You've always had a special kind of charm on people. For some reason, people see you as an ideal candidate for an evening of fun, or a lifelong partner. This ... skill ? ... gave you a rather strange point of view on life.

It might be a good idea to see with your DM the list of cities and towns in which you have lovers and determine who these lovers are beforehand for a more smooth introduction of their characters in the game.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Thieves tools or Herbalist's pack or Disguise kit
Languages: Two standard languages of your choice.
Equipment: a set of elegant clothes, a set of traveller's clothes, a grooming kit including a block of soap, a belt pouch with 20 gp.

setters.set: Persuation, Performance, Thieves tools/Herbalist's pack/Disguise kit, Languages

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: Things come easy to me, so isn't it natural if I'm a bit laid back?
It's all a game, right?
I have a strange quirk that people remember me by.
I always try to find the most peaceful resolution to disputes.
It doesn't matter who it is, I'm getting in their pants !
I find people fascinating and always try to know as much as possible of any person I meet.
I have a commemorative trinket from every lover I've had.
Life is ephemeral, I mean to live it to the fullest.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Family. One day, I'll find the one and settle down. (Lawful)
Love. I'm searching for true love but can't seem to find it. (Good)
Domination. My lovers are mine and always will be. (Evil)
Joy. Giving joy to others is my reason for living. (Good)
Selfish. Ha ! More for me, less for you ! (Neutral)
Freedom. I can't help it, I just don't want to be tied down. (Chaotic)

select.name: Bond
select.item: Some of my lovers really love me and want to be with me forever, I have mixed feelings about this.
I'm indebted to a person, I hope to repay them one day.
Someone murdered one of my lovers to get to me and I'll never forgive them.
An angry husband murdered his wife after discovering me in her bed, I'll never forget this trauma or forgive myself.
Every lover gives me something very precious, I feel I owe them something.
I'm actually really, deeply in love with one of my lovers.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I'm more than lazy.
I don't care about hurting people's feelings.
I'm strangely possessive of my new lovers.
I'm actually a stalker.
I don't feel guilt, I don't feel much of anything actually.
I'm addicted to a substance or a behaviour or a person

description.p: People of your preferred sex (or not!) seem to be constantly attracted to you romantically or sexually. Because of this, you may end up in strange, potentially troublesome situations. In every place humanoids gather, you will be accosted at least once per week you remain there by an NPC looking to become your lover. This interest can be purely physical or romantic. The NPC can already be engaged/married or not. They might be honest with you or not. Enjoy the best curse in the world !
